thread.title: Bumagsak ang Tullow Oil habang lumalayo ang Kosmos
thread.title_full: Bumagsak ang Tullow Oil habang lumalayo ang Kosmos

author: Michele Maatouk
title: Bumagsak ang Tullow Oil habang lumalayo ang Kosmos
text:
Bumagsak ang Tullow Oil habang lumalayo ang Kosmos
[Tullow Oil](https://tl.sharecast.com/katarungan/Tullow_Oil)
21.20p
11:10 17/12/24
-9.01%
-2.10p
Tullow Oil tumbled noong Martes pagkatapos Enerhiya ng Kosmos said it does not plan to make an offer for the oil and gas exploration company.
[FTSE All-Share](https://tl.sharecast.com/index/FTSE_Lahat-ng-Pagbabahagi)
4,481.11
11:10 17/12/24
n / a
n / a
[FTSE Maliit na Cap](https://tl.sharecast.com/index/FTSE_Small_Cap)
6,850.32
11:10 17/12/24
n / a
n / a
[Mga Gumagawa ng Langis at Gas](https://tl.sharecast.com/index/Mga-Oil_Gas_Producer)
7,711.66
11:09 17/12/24
-1.33%
-103.97
Kosmos did not provide any reasons for its decision, saying simply that it does not intend to make an offer "at this time".
Shares in Tullow surged last week after it confirmed it was in preliminary talks with Kosmos about a potential takeover.
Kosmos had until on 9 January 2025 to either announce a firm intention to make an offer or walk away.
At 1105 GMT, Tullow shares were down 8% at 21.44p.
